General.Name: Wayz Intelligent Manufacturing Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Wayzim Technology Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of intelligent logistics sorting systems for the logistics express industry in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent vision, drum motors, intelligent control and industrial sensors, intelligent sorting, intelligent warehousing, and auto conveying products. Its products are used in express delivery, medicine, e-commerce, fast-moving consumer goods, tobacco, airports, automobiles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
